channel.title: Edge-Ai on Rudy Pei (裴彦儒)
channel.description: Recent content in Edge-Ai on Rudy Pei (裴彦儒)

item.title: Temporal Neural Networks (TENNs) at BrainChip
item.description: While working at BrainChip, I led the research and software-hardware codesign of TENNs (Temporal Neural Networks) — a family of deep state-space models designed for efficient, low-latency inference on edge hardware. This line of work developed in parallel with the broader SSM wave (Mamba, Gated Delta Net, etc.), cross-pollinating ideas around structured recurrences, parallel scans, and kernel parameterizations.
